title: Danielle Lloyd makes thinly-veiled jibe at nemesis Rebekah Vardy
text:
Danielle Lloyd has made a thinly-veiled dig at Rebekah Vardy after weighing in on the Coleen Rooney row during an episode of This Morning on Thursday.

Their spat was sparked after the TV personality, 35, detailed her 'similar run-ins' with the footballer's wife, before Rebekah claimed Danielle was only upset because she didn't 'recruit' one of Jamie's footballer pals for her after her divorce.

This comes amid reports that many of the WAGs have now distanced themselves from Rebekah, 37, and are busy 'scrutinising' past conversations with her, following the fallout from her feud with Coleen.

Ouch! Danielle Lloyd has made a thinly-veiled dig at Rebekah Vardy after weighing in on the Coleen Rooney row during an episode of This Morning on Thursday

On Wednesday it was revealed that Coleen had set up an elaborate sting on Instagram for months to 'catch' who was leaking fake stories - leading her to Rebekah's account.

After a day of back and forth with Rebekah online on Thursday, Danielle took to Instagram to share a sultry snap of herself posing in a slouchy jumper with a pouty expression.

Underneath the image, Danielle reflected on the argument and appeared to take aim at Danielle, saying: 'Don't let negative people spoil your day.'

Danielle appeared on the morning TV show to express her opinion on the WAG war, and hinted that she has had a similar experience with Rebekah in the past.

Similar story: Their spat was sparked after the TV personality, 35, detailed her 'similar run-ins' with the footballer's wife

However Jamie's wife was quick to retaliate, as she took to Twitter to claim that Danielle's admission was 'utter b******s' and their feud was sparked by her refusal to try and find Danielle a man following her split from Jamie O'Hara.

She wrote: 'Danielle Lloyd making false claims on @thismorning that we have had ‘similar run-ins’ is utter b****cks.

'She is just fuming that I ‘didn’t get Jamie recruiting’ for her like she asked me to...'

Other side of the story: Rebekah claimed Danielle was only upset because she didn't 'recruit' one of Jamie's footballer pals for her after her divorce

Danielle then accused Rebekah of selling 'more' stories to The Sun, a day after Coleen accused her of leaking fake stories about her life.

The Sun posted a story in which a well-timed source claimed Rebekah WAS telling the truth and Danielle did enlist her to help her find love.

Fuming, Danielle, who has previously dated Teddy Sheringham and Jermain Defoe, took to Twitter once again and said Rebekah must be this source of this new story.

Pals: Danielle appeared on the morning TV show to express her opinion on the WAG war, and hinted that she has had a similar experience with Rebekah in the past

Wagatha Christie: On Wednesday it was revealed that Coleen had set up an elaborate sting on Instagram for months to 'catch' who was leaking fake stories

She penned: 'Omg she is still selling fake stories!!!! Think she would of learnt her lesson.'

Her words came after the source told The Sun: 'Danielle said she was miserable and bored and desperate for her old showbiz life back - she wanted Jamie [Vardy] to ask his footballer mates if they wanted to date her.

'She was keen to bag herself a rich top footballer - as far as she was concerned Becky had the glamorous millionaire lifestyle she'd always dreamed of and so she begged her for help to get back into that circle.'

'It's ...... Rebekah Vardy's account': Coleen's dramatic revelation, in which she detailed her investigative work, enthralled the world

'I don't need the money': Rebekah denied all accusations against her minutes after the post and said she had nothing to gain and had no financial motivation

The source continued: 'Unfortunately Danielle was left disappointed as nothing panned out.'

'Danielle may well have asked for help in finding a footballer years ago, but that doesn't mean Danielle can't have an opinion about Rebekah's 'betrayal' of Coleen.'

She and her ex, O'Hara were married from 2012 - 2014 and have three sons together.

Plan: However, Coleen reportedly knew that merely blocking Rebekah wasn't 'going to cut the mustard' and that she 'needed proof' - hence how her elaborate plan came into fruition

She is now happily married to electrician Michael O'Neill and they have a son called Ronnie, 23 months.

Becky also tweeted earlier: 'On a more serious note I’ve been inundated with messages from everyone but I’m not saying anything more until we’ve finished looking into this situation properly.'

Danielle shot back: '@RebekahVardy Do you mean like how the sun recruited you Luv! #secretwag,' in reference to rumours that she is The Sun On Sunday's Secret Wag columnist.

'We are all entitled to our opinions and we all know it came from your account attacking me won’t take that away another low blow by you #notagirlsgirl.' [sic].

Heavily pregnant Rebekah has denied all accusations against her and said she will clear her name.

It has been revealed that Rebekah has hired a team of forensic IT experts to prove her innocence after Coleen accused her of selling stories to the press through information she obtained from her private Instagram.
description: Danielle Lloyd has made a thinly-veiled dig at Rebekah Vardy after weighing in on the Coleen Rooney row during an episode of This Morning on Thursday.
